page.title: 19Impressions of Westhill cont
page.content: Westhill is a nice place in which to live but there is not enough for the young people to do. It would be better if there were a swimming pool and a sports arena.The disco's ,organised by the Community Centre , are good but there is not enough of them. There is a good selection of shops though it would be improved by a record shop and a sports wear shop. There should be a large play field for small children. A number of the adults would also like a bookmakers. Older children would like a cafe to go to and listen to records whilst they eat snacks ( all the eating places already here are very expensive ).Even the chip shop is dear, and young people can't stay in it if it is wet.
